room_title: Escape room "The Cell" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: We had a group of 10. We booked the Cell. It was really fun. It was exciting and adventurous! Very detailed. The atmosphere was clean and we will definitely be back! We escaped!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Cell" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: My family and I wanted to try the escape room and it exceeded our expectation. The staff was friendly and professional and the actual room was amazing. I will definitely do again when I come back to Cleveland. The Death Row escape room was challenging and fun. Although we didn't make it out, the experience was amazing.

room_title: Escape room "The Cell" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: Far exceeds any other escape room we've tried. The staff was friendly and the room (jail cell) was fun. There were so many details and surprises. I honestly think I gasped at one reveal. It was clever and exciting and a great value.Highly recommended.

room_title: Escape room "The Cell" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: Highly recommend if you are looking for a fun group activity!! We escaped from the jail cell and had an absolute blast doing it. We can't wait to come back and check out the other 3 rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Cell" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: So fun! We did "the Cell" room with a group of 7...2 adults and 5 kids (ages 10 through 14) and we all had a blast! We didn't make it out...but it was so challenging and fun to find the clues and work TOGETHER to solve the puzzles. Worth every penny! Can't wait for the next rooms to open!
